prompt-scan-code: Scan or enter your code or label
dialog-code-not-recognized: Your code is not recognized, please try again or call 012 511-12-91
prompt-remove-from-slot: Please pick up your delivery from open slot. Close door to continue.
dialog-more-pickup: There's more for you! Please pickup from open slot. Close slot to continue.
dialog-finish-message: All done! Thank you for using Smart Post! Have a great day!
prompt-dropoff-cancelled: Your dropoff will be cancelled. Please pickup your deposited parcels from open slots.
prompt-deposit: Please deposit in the open slot. Close the slot door to continue.
